Sentencas: To enhance oxidation resistance, avoid Cr evaporation and preserve suitable electrical behavior of Crofer 22 APU stainless steel as the interconnect of solid oxide fuel cells, Co/ZrO2 composite coatings were applied on Crofer
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects

Sentencas: 22 APU using the pulse electroplating technique.
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects

Sentencas: Moreover, isothermal and cyclic oxidation measurements were used to investigate oxidation resistance.
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects

Sentencas: In addition, oxidation rates were estimated and microstructures of the coatings were investigated before and after the oxidation tests.
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects

Sentencas: According to the results, the coated specimen had a lower oxidation rate constant than the uncoated specimen after 500 h of oxidation.
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy coupled with energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy and X-ray diffraction analysis showed that the oxide scale formed on the coated steel after oxidation was composed of two layers.
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects

Sentencas: The results also showed that the inner layer is thinner and contains Cr and O, while the outer layer is composed of Co, Mn, Cr and O. Furthermore, ZrO2 particles were also found in the outer oxide layer, following the oxidation tests.
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects

Sentencas: The Co/ZrO2-coated steel has a thinner inner oxide layer and a lower oxidation rate than the uncoated steel.
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects

Sentencas: Additionally, the area-specific resistance (ASR) of the steels with and without coating was also estimated as a function of temperature and time.
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects

Sentencas: The results showed that the growth rate of Cr2O3 layer decreased after applying the Co/ZrO2 composite coating, which resulted in lower ASR value.
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects

Sentencas: Moreover, after 500 h of oxidation at 800 degrees C, the ASR value of the Co/ZrO2-coated and uncoated steels was 13 m omega cm(2) and 27.8 m omega cm(2), respectively.
Titulo: Pulse Electrodeposition of Cobalt/Zirconia Coatings: Oxidation and Electrical Performance of Ferritic Stainless Steel Interconnects
